UICC_CARD_IND in case of ICC card
UICC_APPLICATION_RESP in case of ICC card

output.name: SEC_CODE_CHANGE_REQ ( SEC_CODE_LOCK, old code 12345, new code 12345 )
SEC_CODE_VERIFY_REQ ( SEC_CODE_PIN, old code 1234, new code 1234 )
SEC_CODE_VERIFY_REQ ( SEC_CODE_PIN2, old code 5678, new code 9999 )

step.name: UICC_CARD_IND in case of ICC card
UICC_APPLICATION_RESP in case of ICC card
SEC_CODE_CHANGE_REQ ( SEC_CODE_LOCK, old code 12345, new code 12345 )

case.name: This is dummy case to start NTSY
Set FdnStatus when state already correct
Get and Set Fdn Status in case of ICC card
Set Fdn Status in case of ICC card, command fails
Set Fdn Status in case of ICC card, state already correct
Set Fdn Status in case of ICC card, file info reading fails
Set_FdnStatus when FDN not supported in EFust
Get and Set Fdn Status in case of ICC card, FDN not supported in EFsst
